column5: Just wondernig if anybody been out lately?  Looking to head out of Meaford, Collingwood, or Wasaga Beach, or even Spratts point this weekend.  Thaqnks for all your help.

Was out last weekend off wasaga beach bud marking bait and fish steady was a slow bite though only got the hooks into one and had a tackle malfunction so never landed it .with the weather the way it has been its hard to say if it will pick up but its been dead slow thus far    tight lines wee scot
